verses.verse: Now when Jacob <S%H3290><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> there was <S%H3426><s%> corn <S%H7668><s%> in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto his sons, <S%H1121><s%> Why <S%H4100><s%> do ye look one upon another? <S%H7200><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have heard <S%H8085><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> there is <S%H3426><s%> corn <S%H7668><s%> in Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> get you down <S%H3381><s%> thither, <S%H8033><s%> and buy <S%H7666><s%> for us from thence; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> that we may live, <S%H2421><s%> and not <S%H3808><s%> die. <S%H4191><s%>
And Joseph's <S%H3130><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> brethren <S%H251><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> to buy <S%H7666><s%> corn <S%H1250><s%> in Egypt. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%>

But Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> Joseph's <S%H3130><s%> brother, <S%H251><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> with <S%H854><s%> his brethren; <S%H251><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> Lest peradventure <S%H6435><s%> mischief <S%H611><s%> befall <S%H7122><s%> him.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to buy <S%H7666><s%> corn among <S%H8432><s%> those that came: <S%H935><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the famine <S%H7458><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> was the governor <S%H7989><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> and he <S%H1931><s%> it was that sold <S%H7666><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land: <S%H776><s%> and Joseph's <S%H3130><s%> brethren <S%H251><s%> came, <S%H935><s%> and bowed down themselves <S%H7812><s%> before him with their faces <S%H639><s%> to the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> his brethren, <S%H251><s%> and he knew <S%H5234><s%> them, but made himself strange <S%H5234><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, and spoke <S%H1696><s%> roughly <S%H7186><s%> unto <S%H854><s%> them; and he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Whence <S%H4480><s%> <S%H370><s%> come <S%H935><s%> ye? And they said, <S%H559><s%> From the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> to buy <S%H7666><s%> food. <S%H400><s%>
And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> knew <S%H5234><s%> <S%H853><s%> his brethren, <S%H251><s%> but they <S%H1992><s%> knew <S%H5234><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> him.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> remembered <S%H2142><s%> <S%H853><s%> the dreams <S%H2472><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he dreamed <S%H2492><s%> of them, and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Ye <S%H859><s%> are spies; <S%H7270><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> ye are come. <S%H935><s%>
And they said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Nay, <S%H3808><s%> my lord, <S%H113><s%> but to buy <S%H7666><s%> food <S%H400><s%> are thy servants <S%H5650><s%> come. <S%H935><s%>

We <S%H5168><s%> are all <S%H3605><s%> one <S%H259><s%> man's <S%H376><s%> sons; <S%H1121><s%> we <S%H587><s%> are true <S%H3651><s%> men, thy servants <S%H5650><s%> are <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> spies. <S%H7270><s%>
And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Nay, <S%H3808><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> ye are come. <S%H935><s%>

And they said, <S%H559><s%> Thy servants <S%H5650><s%> are twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> brethren, <S%H251><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan; <S%H3667><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the youngest <S%H6996><s%> is this day <S%H3117><s%> with <S%H854><s%> our father, <S%H1><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> is not. <S%H369><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, That <S%H1931><s%> is it that <S%H834><s%> I spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> you, saying, <S%H559><s%> Ye <S%H859><s%> are spies: <S%H7270><s%>

Hereby <S%H2063><s%> ye shall be proved: <S%H974><s%> By the life <S%H2416><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> ye shall not go forth <S%H3318><s%> hence, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> except <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> your youngest <S%H6996><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> come <S%H935><s%> hither. <S%H2008><s%>

Send <S%H7971><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> you, and let him fetch <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> your brother, <S%H251><s%> and ye <S%H859><s%> shall be kept in prison, <S%H631><s%> that your words <S%H1697><s%> may be proved, <S%H974><s%> whether there be any truth <S%H571><s%> in <S%H854><s%> you: or else <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> by the life <S%H2416><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> surely <S%H3588><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> are spies. <S%H7270><s%>
And he put them all together <S%H622><s%> <S%H853><s%> into <S%H413><s%> ward <S%H4929><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them the third <S%H7992><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> This <S%H2063><s%> do, <S%H6213><s%> and live; <S%H2421><s%> for I <S%H589><s%> fear <S%H3373><s%> <S%H853><s%> God: <S%H430><s%>

If <S%H518><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> be true <S%H3651><s%> men, let one <S%H259><s%> of your brethren <S%H251><s%> be bound <S%H631><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of your prison: <S%H4929><s%> go <S%H1980><s%> ye, <S%H859><s%> carry <S%H935><s%> corn <S%H7668><s%> for the famine <S%H7459><s%> of your houses: <S%H1004><s%>

But bring <S%H935><s%> your youngest <S%H6996><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me; so shall your words <S%H1697><s%> be verified, <S%H539><s%> and ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> die. <S%H4191><s%> And they did <S%H6213><s%> so. <S%H3651><s%>

And they said <S%H559><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to <S%H413><s%> another, <S%H251><s%> We <S%H587><s%> are verily <S%H61><s%> guilty <S%H818><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> our brother, <S%H251><s%> in that <S%H834><s%> we saw <S%H7200><s%> the anguish <S%H6869><s%> of his soul, <S%H5315><s%> when he besought <S%H2603><s%> <S%H413><s%> us, and we would not <S%H3808><s%> hear; <S%H8085><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> is this <S%H2063><s%> distress <S%H6869><s%> come <S%H935><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> us.

And Reuben <S%H7205><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> them, saying, <S%H559><s%> Spoke <S%H559><s%> I not <S%H3808><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> you, saying, <S%H559><s%> Do not <S%H408><s%> sin <S%H2398><s%> against the child; <S%H3206><s%> and ye would not <S%H3808><s%> hear? <S%H8085><s%> therefore, behold, <S%H2009><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> his blood <S%H1818><s%> is required. <S%H1875><s%>

And they <S%H1992><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> understood <S%H8085><s%> them; for <S%H3588><s%> he spoke unto <S%H996><s%> them by an interpreter. <S%H3887><s%>

And he turned himself about <S%H5437><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> them, and wept; <S%H1058><s%> and returned <S%H7725><s%> to <S%H413><s%> them again, and communed <S%H1696><s%> with <S%H413><s%> them, and took <S%H3947><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> them <S%H853><s%> Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> and bound <S%H631><s%> him before their eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

Then Joseph <S%H3130><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> to fill <S%H4390><s%> <S%H853><s%> their sacks <S%H3627><s%> with corn, <S%H1250><s%> and to restore <S%H7725><s%> every man's <S%H376><s%> money <S%H3701><s%> into <S%H413><s%> his sack, <S%H8242><s%> and to give <S%H5414><s%> them provision <S%H6720><s%> for the way: <S%H1870><s%> and thus <S%H3651><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> he unto them.
And they laded <S%H5375><s%> <S%H5921><s%> their asses <S%H2543><s%> with <S%H853><s%> the corn, <S%H7668><s%> and departed <S%H1980><s%> thence. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%>

And as one <S%H259><s%> of them opened <S%H6605><s%> <S%H853><s%> his sack <S%H8242><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> his ass <S%H2543><s%> provender <S%H4554><s%> in the inn, <S%H4411><s%> he espied <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> his money; <S%H3701><s%> for, behold, <S%H2009><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> was in his sack's <S%H572><s%> mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his brethren, <S%H251><s%> My money <S%H3701><s%> is restored; <S%H7725><s%> and, lo, <S%H2009><s%> it is even <S%H1571><s%> in my sack: <S%H572><s%> and their heart <S%H3820><s%> failed <S%H3318><s%> them, and they were afraid, <S%H2729><s%> saying <S%H559><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to <S%H413><s%> another, <S%H251><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> is this <S%H2063><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> hath done <S%H6213><s%> unto us?

And they came <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> their father <S%H1><s%> unto the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> and told <S%H5046><s%> him <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that befell <S%H7136><s%> unto them; saying, <S%H559><s%>

The man, <S%H376><s%> who is the lord <S%H113><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> roughly <S%H7186><s%> to <S%H854><s%> us, and took <S%H5414><s%> us for spies <S%H7270><s%> of <S%H853><s%> the country. <S%H776><s%>
And we said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, We <S%H587><s%> are true <S%H3651><s%> men; we are <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> spies: <S%H7270><s%>

We <S%H587><s%> be twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> brethren, <S%H251><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> of our father; <S%H1><s%> one <S%H259><s%> is not, <S%H369><s%> and the youngest <S%H6996><s%> is this day <S%H3117><s%> with <S%H854><s%> our father <S%H1><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%>

And the man, <S%H376><s%> the lord <S%H113><s%> of the country, <S%H776><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> us, Hereby <S%H2063><s%> shall I know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> are true <S%H3651><s%> men; leave <S%H5117><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of your brethren <S%H251><s%> here with <S%H854><s%> me, and take <S%H3947><s%> food for the famine <S%H7459><s%> of your households, <S%H1004><s%> and be gone: <S%H1980><s%>

And bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> your youngest <S%H6996><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me: then shall I know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> are no <S%H3808><s%> spies, <S%H7270><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> that ye <S%H859><s%> are true <S%H3651><s%> men: so will I deliver <S%H5414><s%> you <S%H853><s%> your brother, <S%H251><s%> and ye shall traffic <S%H5503><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>

And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> as they <S%H1992><s%> emptied <S%H7324><s%> their sacks, <S%H8242><s%> that, behold, <S%H2009><s%> every man's <S%H376><s%> bundle <S%H6872><s%> of money <S%H3701><s%> was in his sack: <S%H8242><s%> and when both they <S%H1992><s%> and their father <S%H1><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the bundles <S%H6872><s%> of money, <S%H3701><s%> they were afraid. <S%H3372><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> their father <S%H1><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Me have ye bereaved <S%H7921><s%> of my children: Joseph <S%H3130><s%> is not, <S%H369><s%> and Simeon <S%H8095><s%> is not, <S%H369><s%> and ye will take <S%H3947><s%> Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> away: all <S%H3605><s%> these things are <S%H1961><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me.

And Reuben <S%H7205><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his father, <S%H1><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Slay <S%H4191><s%> <S%H853><s%> my two <S%H8147><s%> sons, <S%H1121><s%> if <S%H518><s%> I bring <S%H935><s%> him not <S%H3808><s%> to <S%H413><s%> thee: deliver <S%H5414><s%> him into <S%H5921><s%> my hand, <S%H3027><s%> and I <S%H589><s%> will bring <S%H7725><s%> him to <S%H413><s%> thee again.

And he said, <S%H559><s%> My son <S%H1121><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> go down <S%H3381><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> you; for <S%H3588><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%> is dead, <S%H4191><s%> and he <S%H1931><s%> is left <S%H7604><s%> alone: <S%H905><s%> if mischief <S%H611><s%> befall <S%H7122><s%> him by the way <S%H1870><s%> in the which <S%H834><s%> ye go, <S%H1980><s%> then shall ye bring down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H853><s%> my gray hairs <S%H7872><s%> with sorrow <S%H3015><s%> to the grave. <S%H7585><s%>
